required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase Ⅲ Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Hemay022+Aromatase Inhibitor(AI) in Participants With ER+/HER2+ Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Multicenter, Parallel,Phase III Open-label Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Hemay022 + AI in Patients With ER+/HER2+ Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer Who Have Received Prior Trastuzumab-Based Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Hemay Oncology Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Hemay Oncology Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase III, randomized, multicenter, 2-arm, open-label clinical trial designed to compare the safety and efficacy of Hemay022+Aromatase inhibitor(AI) with that of capecitabine + lapatinib in participants with ER+/HER2+ locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer. Participants will be treated until disease progression (PD), unmanageable toxicity, or study termination. Once disease progression is reported, all participants will be followed for survival every 3 months until death, loss to follow-up.

primary_outcome.measure: Median progression-free survival（mPFS）based on Independent Review Committee (IRC) assessment according to RECIST v1.1
primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 month
primary_outcome.description: PFS defined as the proportion of patients alive and without progression

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Survival (OS) of the two group according to RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of death from any cause, whichever came first,assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: OS is defined as the time from random to any cause of death

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate ( ORR, partial response rate+ complete response rate) according to RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 month
secondary_outcome.description: ORR defined as the proportion of subjects in complete response (CR) or (partial response) PR

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical benefit rate (CBR) according to RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 month
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical benefit rate defined as percentage of patients with stable disease (SD) ≥ 6 months/partial response (PR)/complete response (CR)

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response (DOR) according to RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first recorded CR or PR until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 month
secondary_outcome.description: DOR defined as the duration after the first assessment as CR or PR, only applicable to subjects who have achieved remission

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of the first recorded CR or PR assessed up to 36 month
secondary_outcome.description: TTR defined as the time from random to CR or PR for the first time

arm_group.description: Hemay022 in combination with AI will be taken orally once daily. Planned dose of Hemay022 will be 500mg daily for 21 days.
lapatinib in combination with capecitabine will be taken in suitable dose until disease progression or death, etc.

intervention.description: Take the pills according to the instructions
